name: Holistic Facial Toner
description:
Tone, hydrate, tighten pores, and balance the pH of your skin with a natural facial toner.
Every good facial routine should include a toner to prepair skin for moisturizer or serum.
Plant based toners, especially hydrosols, make the best facial toner. 
Our Holistic Facial Toners are made from pure plant waters naturally occuring during the distillation of essential oils

name: Rose Day and Night Creams 1.8 oz
description: Very gentle and soft moisturizers. Made with  natural rose water and rose oil.  Absorbs very well and is not greasy.

name: Anti-aging Facial Serum with Carrot Seed Oil - 40 ml
description:
Anti-aging blend of carrot seed oil, herbs, and vitamins that prevent the aging factors of life. This 100% natural hydrating moisturizer leaves skin soft, healthy, and buoyant. 

Can be used in the morning (under make-up) and during the night.
Absorbs very well, and is not greasy.
Our best seller in Whole Foods.

name: Anti-aging Facial Creams with Carrot Seed Oil - 1.8 oz
description:
Anti-aging blend of carrot seed oil, herbs and vitamins to prevent from aging factors of life. This 100% natural hydrating moisturizer leaves skin soft, healthy and buoyant. Absorbs very well and is not greasy.

Ingredients: Purified water, *aloe leaf, *unrefined jojoba seed oil, *sunflower seed oil, *seabuckthorn fruit oil, carrot seed CO2, meadowfoam seed oil, stearic acid, *soybean oil, natural grain alcohol, emulsifying wax NF, glycerin, palmitic acid, vitamin E, potassium sorbate, citric acid, *rosemary leaf

*Certified Organic

options.name: Anti-aging Facial Cream with Carrot Seed Oil-Day
Anti-aging Facial Cream with Carrot Seed Oil -Night

name: Facial Cleansing Grains - 1.8 oz
description:
100% Natural way  to clean, tone and beautify your skin without soaps,  soapy cleansers and scrubs.             

Base in clays and herbs. Suitable for all skin types and formulated for everyday use.

Directions for Use: Apply 1/8 tsp. of Facial Cleansing Grains to damp skin. Add more water if needed. Gently massage, avoid eyes, rinse well.

Ingredients: *aloe vera leaf, french green clay, rose clay, *calendula flower, *gluten free oats kernel, *plantain leaf, *corn kernel meal

*Certified Organic

name: Hot Flash Control Blend
description:
This herbal blend help to balance hormones and tones the uterus.
Contains plant estrogens, phytosterols and coumestrols combined to reduce symptoms of estrogen deficiency naturally.This blend help to reduce hot flashes and excessive sweating, including the elimination of night sweats.
Contains:*sage,*wild yam root,*chaste tree berries,*peppermint,*red raspberry leaf.  *Certified Organic 
Makes 27 cups

name: Teas for Relaxation and Sleep
description:
Holistic Sleep Blend
A very relaxing blend with chamomile, peppermint and valerian root which will take you right to dream land.
Use just before bedtime. Contains:*peppermint,*chamomile,*valerian root,*lavender    *Certified Organic

                     Chamomile&Citrus Blend
Organic Very healthy and relaxing blend. Enriched with calming chamomile, delicious citrus and hibiscus flowers.
Contains:*orange peel,*chamomile flowers,*hibiscus flower,*lemon peel,*marigold   *Certified Organic
                                                                                                      Small size bag makes 30 cups

name: Woman's Balancing Tea
description:
This blend heps to support the female system during all stages of a woman's life and especially during PMS.This blend aids in healthy menstrual cycles (regular and painless) and even during menopause balances hormones and tones the uterus. Has a very delicious taste.
Contains: * red raspberry leaf,* motherwort,* peppermint,*nettle,*oatstraw,* fennel seed,*chamomile flowers,*horsetail. *Certified Organic
small size makes 30 cups, big size makes  55 cups

name: Stainless Steel Tea Infuser Spoon
description: Spoon type. Stainless steel. For all loose teas. Dishwasher safe.

name: Himalayan Bath Salts
description: Makes 15  aromatherapy baths

name: Holistic Cologne for Men 4fl oz     Herbal Aftershave 8fl oz
Holistic Deodorant - 4 fl oz
description:
All-natural deodorant formula which was formulated without aluminum chlorohydrate, propylene glycol ,fragrance oils or harsh chemicals which can irritate the skin. 

The unique formulation is gentle and healing, and provides lasting protection.

Contains: purified water, natural alcohol,*extracts of white thyme, aloe vera and grape fruit seed, french green clay,*essential oils

*Certified Organic

name: No Gray Hair Oil with Hibiscus Flower 4 fl oz
description: Multiple benefits of this oil are: prevents  premature graying of hair, prevent hair loss, enhances growth of hair,  discourages split ends, thickens hair.

name: Herbal Hair Extracts with 8 Essential Herbs
description: Add these extracts to your shampoo.

name: Revitalizing Hibiscus Hair Rinse 8 fl oz
description: Treat dandruff, prevents hair loss, prevents premature graying of hair, enhances growth of hair, discourages split ends, thickens hair.Use after shampooing instead of conditioner.Great for natural oil control. Will last for 40 treatments.Base in apple cider vinegar.

name: Balm of Gilead Calendula Salve - 2 oz
description: Effective remedy for dry skin, cracked hands, heels and knuckles, rough elbows and eczema. Immediately calms skin discomfort due to shaving, sun burns, rashes and damage. It's designed to work on tough areas and to fill existing skin cracks with healing nutrients. Daily use of our Balm of Gilead Salve will help soothe and repair severely dry damaged skin, no longer causing pain and discomfort. It absorbs well and stays on your skin for hours. Your hands will continue feeling soft and smooth, even after several hand washing. Our Balm is extremely concentrated, so a little goes a long way.

name: Seaweed Facial Serum - 40 ml
description:
Anti-aging Seaweed Facial Serum is an intensive blend of sea algae extracts, precious oils and vitamins that cell regenerates, oxygenates                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              and detoxifies skin, while improving elasticity and texture.

Dulse leaf and red /green algae extracts oxygenate and hydrate with  trace elements and amino acids.

Ingredients: *jojoba seed oil, *evening primrose oil, *dulse leaf, *bladderwrack, *kelp, and *irish moss.

*Certified Organic

name: European Slimming Seaweed Bath - 454 gm
description:
Our special mix of salts and exotic seaweeds encourages detoxification in your body.

Seaweeds have been known to:
Speed-up metabolism, stimulate lymph drainage, reduce water retention, eliminate toxins, and fight cellulite.

Seaweed properties naturally hydrate, cell regenerate, oxygenate and remineralize your skin.

Ingredients: unrefined dead sea, mediterranean and icelandic geothermal brine salts, *dulse leaf, *kelp granules, *bladderwrack leaf, *irish moss powder, hiwa kai salt.

*Certified Organic

name: Seaweed Handmade Soap
description:
Our handmade soap is made with the finest seaweeds and has an exfoliating and slimming affect that loosen dead cells and encourages new cell growth. 

It also helps to fight cellulite and stimulates lymph drainage. 
Has remineralizing, revitalizing  and detoxifying properties as well.

name: Remineralizing Seaweed Body Scrub - 11 oz
description:
This scrub has revitalizing and detoxifying properties with essential oils. 

It actually helps your body eliminate metabolic waste, encourages new cell growth and tissue regeneration while also encouraging white blood cell production. Added Shea Butter moisturizes and soothes skin. 

Scrub should be used once or twice a week for lymph, skin and organ health.

name: European Seaweed Body Oil - 8 fl oz
description:
Our seaweed oil oxygenates, cell regenerates, and remineralizes your skin. Seaweeds are also known to fight CELLULITE and detoxify skin while improving elasticity and texture.

Ingredients: jojoba seed oil, grape seed oil, *dulse leaf, *bladderwrack leaf, *kelp granules, *irish moss powder.

*Certified Organic
